pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detection of Low-Quality Peaks in Untargeted Metabolomics Data // Utilizes 12 peak quality metrics and 9 diverse machine learning algorithms to build a classifier for the automatic assessment of peak integration quality of peaks from untargeted metabolomics analyses. The 12 peak quality metrics were adapted from those defined in the following references: Zhang, W., Zhao, P.X. (2014) doi:10.1186/1471-2105-15-S11-S5 Toghi Eshghi, S., Auger, P., Mathews, W.R. (2018) doi:10.1186/s12014-018-9209-x.
